Description: On I-64 at mile marker 255.4 in the City of Newport News, near Jefferson Avenue, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east outside entrance ramp is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On VA-311 in the County of Roanoke, in the vicinity of Dutch Oven Rd; Rt. 863N/S (Roanoke County), motorists can expect delays due to an incident. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Other Traffic

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 59.8 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east exit 60 narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
